text: Wendy B. Libby, a native of Brooklyn, New York, is an American college administrator. She attended Cornell University and received a Bachelor’s (Biology) in 1972, an MBA from Cornell’s Johnson Graduate School of Management in 1977. She earned her doctorate in Educational Administration from the University of Connecticut in 1994. She was president of Stephens College in Columbia, Missouri, the second oldest women’s institute in America, from 2003 to 2009. She was named the ninth president of Stetson University in July 2009. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Heads of universities and colleges in the United States Category:Stephens College faculty Category:Stetson University faculty Category:Samuel Curtis Johnson Graduate School of Management alumni Category:University of Connecticut alumni Category:People from Brooklyn
title: Wendy B. Libby
